https://tmrev.io/movie/408204-Andre Valente 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null An authentic and convincing story of a small boy, son of a disrupted young couple, with all the typical hostile reactions about his mother's new love relationship and a behavior showing a mixture of love and resentment towards her, ending in a curious and somewhat moving friendship between the child and a Russian migrant worker who in a certain way replaces his estranged father. Andre Valente
